name: athlete-context-mcp
description: MCP server providing athlete context for use with garmin-mcp

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.verify:dist: grep -q 'McpServer' dist/index.js || (echo 'ERROR: dist/index.js does not contain McpServer' && exit 1) && test -x dist/index.js || (echo 'ERROR: dist/index.js is not executable' && exit 1)
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run verify:dist && node dist/index.js
